During the lockdown, learning should not stop.
Fortunately, many companies came forward to give their products FREE OF COST for those who register till 15th May 2020 for your learning.
Last Date: 15 May 2020
Registration Link: http://free.aicte-india.org/
All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE)
1. Python for Data Science: http://free.aicte-india.org/Data-Science-for-Beginners.php
2. Java Programming: http://free.aicte-india.org/Java-Programming.php
3. Machine Learning onramp: http://free.aicte-india.org/Machine-Learning-Onramp.php
4. AI/ML Internship: http://free.aicte-india.org/AI-ML-Internship.php
5. R Programming: http://free.aicte-india.org/R-Programming.php
6. Big Data 101: http://free.aicte-india.org/BigData101.php
7. Data Analytics using R: http://free.aicte-india.org/data-analytics-using-R.php
8. Machine Learning using Python: http://free.aicte-india.org/machine-learning-using-python.php
9. Programming Work Bench: http://free.aicte-india.org/Programming-Work-Bench.php
10. MATLAB onramp: http://free.aicte-india.org/MATLAB-Onramp.php
11. Deep Learning onramp: http://free.aicte-india.org/Deep-Learning-Onramp.php
12. Free App-based Courses for Communication Skills and Interview Preparation:http://free.aicte-india.org/communication-skills-and-interview-preparation.php
